name: YAKU international
description:
Welcome to YAKU, an award winning game that deals with the shortage of drinking water, its consequences and possible solutions for communities at risk. YAKU is one of the few educational games about water, a simulation featuring real life situations.

Your challenge in this game is to provide water services for different communities and to be sure they are managed in an equitable and harmonious way. Otherwise, these solutions won't be available and family members will get dehydrated, sick or could even die.

NOTE: This game was released a long time ago, when Flash was still popular. This game, and others, are part of SETENTIA's archive, so we can organize our content, in a single page, for historical purposes.
